entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 01:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -30.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -34.1°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
